data.message: Omg! Still remember when me and my Sister bought this tape in a small store in poland back in summer 1998... I Was 13 then and my sis 14, we loved it! every song and lyric.  West brough it back to Sweden after summer holliday and played it in school to show everyone How awesome this tape was but no one Ever heard about eminem Or his music before. .some loved it and some thought it was crap and preferd tamagotchi song. .. hahaha!  That was special moment in music history.  4-6 mounth later everyone new The new rapper eminem and loved him and compared him to 2 pac, biggie, dr dre, snoop. ... nostalgy!
